entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder source generator doesn't work with Azure ClientOptions #94071
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in DecryptEnvelopedOctetStringWithExtraData (linux x64) #94067
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code without a using for a Type #94065
    9.0.0
  • In .NET7 code using Linq.Expressions on iOS crashes unless interpreter is enabled. It did not crash in xamarin-ios. #94063
  • ILLink analyzer analysis holes around dynamic objects #94057
    9.0.0
  • CA1861 reporting for inline arrays in constructors of static properties #94053
  • Could Dynamic PGO be used to augment AOT compilation? #94052
  • [MT][browser] `TestCancelAsync` failure #94050
  • [API Proposal]: Add rendezvous channel without buffer #94046
  • DllImport with SuppressGCTransition causes PAL_SEHException with a hosted runtime in release configuration. #94029
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_BF16 #94028
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_I8MM #94027
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_FP16 #94026
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_F64MM #94025
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_F32MM #94024
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: scatter stores #94023
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: maths #94022
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: mask #94021
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: bit manipulate #94020
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: gather loads #94019
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: fp #94018
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: counting #94017
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE2: bitwise #94015
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: scatter stores #94014
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a factory for creating disposables. #94012
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: stores #94011
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: maths #94009
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: bit manipulation #94008
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: gather loads #94007
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: loads #94006
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: fp #94005
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: firstfaulting #94004
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Arm64: FEAT_SVE: counting #94003
    9.0.0
  • CoreCLR replaces methods in BitConverter with a exteremely slower version #94001

Closed

  • Support of partition scoped and partition singleton service registration in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #92012
    Future
  • [ILink][browser][debug] Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Operations.DynamicMemberReferenceOperation #94016
    9.0.0
  • [mono] build fails with newer compiler on windows #93922
    9.0.0
  • Reload configuration not work for named options add with BindConfiguration extension method. #85665
    Future
  • Test failure readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2determinism.cmd #93839
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Failure `Expected: 1 to be greater than 1 Random character at position 0.` #94040
  • [MT][browser] `System.Collections.ObjectModel.Tests.PublicMethodsTest.RemoveAtTest` failures #94045
  • [MT][browser] Failed to execute 'getRandomValues' on 'Crypto' #94047
  • [MT][browser] `An item with the same key has already been added.` #94049
  • [MT][browser] `DynamicCSharpRunTest` failure #94048
  • [MT][browser] Duplicated attribute failures #94039
  • [MT][browser] `System.Reflection.Metadata.Tests.LargeTablesAndHeapsTests.Guids` failures #94044
  • [MT][browser] ` System.Tests.GuidTests` failures #94043
  • [MT][browser] `System.Security.Cryptography.Tests.RandomNumberGeneratorTests` failures #94041
  • 100GB memory usage in .NET 8 RC-2 and RC-1 #93966

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix literal formatting in source generators #94070
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.1
  • Update trim/aot analyzer to run on generated code #94069
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Added the LOHThreshold public key to the GC Config. #94068
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Improve debugger features #94066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Error out for AOT with no il trimming #94064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support IValidatableObject for nested model types in options source gen #94062
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.1
  • Update `http.client.request.duration` metric description #94061
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fixup file type names. #94059
    blocking, area-Interop-mono
  • [browser][MT] unify pthread pool size to 16 #94056
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Provide Extensions.Hosting.Systemd package readme #94055
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [MT][browser] Disabling tests failing in the last two weeks on MT. #94051
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Tests.ConversionTests #94042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement missing Locale and Casing functions #94038
    os-ios
  • [browser][Wasm.Build.Tests] Use trimmer friendly JSON serialization #94034
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][CI] Add debug smoke test pipeline #94013
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] Implement ThreeLetterISOLanguageName and ThreeLetterISOCountryName in hybrid mode #94010
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [SuperPMI] nativeaot collections build fix #94000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Update library-servicing doc to mention 8.0 #94002
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Simplify of OffsetToStringData as it's done on coreclr #93987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix typo in live analyzer reference configuration #94060
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Add Label support in new ILGenerator #93565
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix analyzer assert and add dynamic object tests #94058
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove xunit.assert from S.C.I rd.xml #93991
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix double delims at the end of dirnames in tpa string when using corerun #93962
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono] Suppress few more MSVC warnings #93923
    area-Build-mono
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Add comment explaining flag usage #94054
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][jit] Improved imm64 for negative numbers #93602
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix the perf issue in TensorPrimitives.MinMaxCore #93944
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Update library-servicing doc to mention 8.0 #93993
    documentation, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT: Log more info to help debug CI #93899
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: move return merging earlier #93997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[arm64] Addressing modes for SIMD (#67490)" #93981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Abstract out LocalBuilder, emit Locals with new ILGenerator #93809
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to build with tfm=net9.0 #93693
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for UnsafeAccessorKind.FieldOffset (#45152) #93946
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement PriorityQueue.Remove #93994
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Implement the ComVariant struct, the ComVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update diasymreader version to 16.11.29-beta1.23404.4 #93998
    needs-area-label
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Having space in path fails builds #92399
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte_Vector not taken on ARM64 #90527
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Disable FastTailCall in case of split arg #93655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/7.0-staging] do not contain `LEA` if offset < 0` #93992
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle null signature destinations for ECDsa / DSA / RSA #93996
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93902
    area-VM-coreclr
